snippet.title: INDUSTRIA 2 Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Industria 2 is a grimdark sci-fi adventure inspired by the Half-Life series. During this year's Spring Showcase, a tense but beautiful gameplay trailer gave us a window into its world. It's coming soon, so make sure it's on your wishlists.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #industria2

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
